channel.title: Question about VPS
channel.description:
Yeah, i've been thinking.. you may call be a noob or something, but please don't flame.
Okay this is the question:
If I run my RSPS on the VPS, but I close my computer.. does the rsps still be on? Even though my own PC is off?
Peace.

item.title: Question about VPS
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

One simply does not purchase a VPS without knowing its purpose.

Hint: virtual private server

Double Hint: yes

Read full topic
